entry.title: Power Fx And My Learning Experience

link.title: Power Fx And My Learning Experience

entry.summary: A few weeks ago a customer asked my employer to create a custom page within their Dynamics CE (Customer Engagment) environment. This page would contain the results of a specific table from a SQL database store externally from their CE environment. The customer wanted to be able to query specific data from this table. With that in mind, the architect assigned to the customer approaches me and sa...
